name: SVNcleaner
short_description:
Removes recursively (full depth) all the hidden .svn folders.
We all know that when working with SVN the project must be exported before distributing it or publishing it online. In this operation you get clean copy of the project that doesn't include the .svn hidden directories. 
But if for some reason we no longer have the repository (if accidentally delete for example), then removing all the hidden folders manually may prove to be a very laborious task.
In that case tools like the SVNcleaner come to be very handy. This small program will recursively remove all the hidden .SVN folders form your project.
summary: Remove .SVN hidden folers from your projects
